author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

As pointed out in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42631#issuecomment-1695166913 it seems there is no data relval workflow that runs the patatrack reconstruction in CPU and GPU and does the comparison between the two (in short using the `gpuValidation` modifier).
I add a workflow here that does that.

#### PR validation:

Run `runTheMatrix.py --what gpu -l 141.583` successfully.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Perhaps to be backported to 13.2.X
title: [RFC] add a 2023 data workflow for all patatrack reconstruction using the `gpuValidation` modifier
